summary: This is an email exchange regarding the scheduling of Jeffrey Epstein's plea hearing. It confirms the plea agreement is unchanged and the hearing is scheduled for July 10, 2019, at 11:30 a.m. at the Magistrate's Court.

persons.name: Raymond L Colon
persons.context: Email correspondent inquiring about the status and scheduling of Jeffrey Epstein's plea hearing and requesting the plea agreement.

events.title: Epstein Plea Hearing Scheduled
events.description: A plea hearing for Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled for 11:30 a.m. at the Magistrate's Court.

events.title: Plea Agreement Sent
events.description: A plea agreement was sent to Raymond L Colon, with no subsequent changes mentioned.

keyFacts: A plea hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for July 10, 2019, at 11:30 a.m.
The plea agreement sent on July 3, 2019, had no changes as of July 9, 2019.
The correspondence congratulates an unnamed recipient on the Epstein case, indicating a legal or professional achievement related to it.
